00035 namespace Ogre {
00036     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00037     SceneNode::SceneNode(SceneManager* creator) 
00038     : Node(), mCreator(creator)
00039     {
00040     }
00041     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00042     SceneNode::SceneNode(SceneManager* creator, const String& name) 
00043     : Node(name), mCreator(creator)
00044     {
00045     }
00046     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     SceneNode::~SceneNode()
00048     {
00049     }
00050     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00051     void SceneNode::_update(Camera* cam, bool updateChildren)
00052     {
00053         // Update transforms
00054         _updateFromParent();
00055 
00056         // Tell attached objects about camera position (incase any extra processing they want to do)
00057         std::vector<MovableObject*>::iterator i;
00058         for (i = mObjects.begin(); i != mObjects.end(); ++i)
00059         {
00060             (*i)->_notifyCurrentCamera(cam);
00061         }
00062 
00063         if (updateChildren)
00064         {
00065             std::vector<Node*>::iterator i;
00066             for (i = mChildren.begin(); i != mChildren.end(); ++i)
00067             {
00068                 SceneNode* sceneChild = static_cast<SceneNode*>(*i);
00069                 sceneChild->_update(cam, updateChildren);
00070             }
00071         }
00072 
00073         _updateBounds();
00074 
00075     }
00076 
00077     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00078     void SceneNode::attachObject(MovableObject* obj)
00079     {
00080         mObjects.push_back(obj);
00081         obj->_notifyAttached(this);
00082 
00083         // Also add to name index
00084         mObjectsByName[obj->getName()] = obj;
00085     }
00086     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00087     unsigned short SceneNode::numAttachedObjects(void)
00088     {
00089         return static_cast< unsigned short >( mObjects.size() );
00090     }
00091     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00092     MovableObject* SceneNode::getAttachedObject(unsigned short index)
00093     {
00094         if (index < mObjects.size())
00095         {
00096             std::vector<MovableObject*>::iterator i = mObjects.begin();
00097             return i[index];
00098         }
00099         else
00100         {
00101             Except(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Object index out of bounds.", "SceneNode::getAttchedEntity");
00102         }
00103         return 0;
00104     }
00105     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00106     MovableObject* SceneNode::getAttachedObject(const String& name)
00107     {
00108         // Look up 
00109         std::map<String, MovableObject*>::iterator i = mObjectsByName.find(name);
00110 
00111         if (i == mObjectsByName.end())
00112         {
00113             Except(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, "Attached object " + 
00114                 name + " not found.", "SceneNode::getAttachedObject");
00115         }
00116 
00117         return i->second;
00118 
00119     }
00120     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00121     MovableObject* SceneNode::detachObject(unsigned short index)
00122     {
00123         MovableObject* ret;
00124         if (index < mObjects.size())
00125         {
00126 
00127             std::vector<MovableObject*>::iterator i = mObjects.begin() + index;
00128             ret = *i;
00129             mObjects.erase(i);
00130             ret->_notifyAttached(0);
00131 
00132             // Also remove from name index
00133             std::map<String, MovableObject*>::iterator idxi = 
00134                 mObjectsByName.find(ret->getName());
00135             mObjectsByName.erase(idxi);
00136 
00137 
00138             return ret;
00139 
00140             /* XXX temas: Original code
00141             std::vector<MovableObject*>::iterator i = mObjects.begin();
00142             ret = i[index];
00143             mObjects.erase(&i[index]);
00144             ret->_notifyAttached(0);
00145             return ret;
00146             */
00147         }
00148         else
00149         {
00150             Except(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, "Object index out of bounds.", "SceneNode::getAttchedEntity");
00151         }
00152         return 0;
00153 
00154     }
00155     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00156     void SceneNode::attachCamera(Camera* cam)
00157     {
00158         attachObject(cam);
00159     }
00160     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00161     void SceneNode::attachLight(Light* lgt)
00162     {
00163         attachObject(lgt);
00164     }
00165     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00166     void SceneNode::detachAllObjects(void)
00167     {
00168         mObjects.clear();
00169     }
00170     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00171     void SceneNode::_updateBounds(void)
00172     {
00173         // Reset bounds first
00174         mWorldAABB.setNull();
00175 
00176         // Update bounds from own attached objects
00177         std::vector<MovableObject*>::iterator i;
00178         AxisAlignedBox bx;
00179         for (i = mObjects.begin(); i != mObjects.end(); ++i)
00180         {
00181             // Get local bounds of object
00182             bx = (*i)->getBoundingBox();
00183             // Transform by aggregated transform
00184             bx.transform(_getFullTransform());
00185 
00186             mWorldAABB.merge(bx);
00187         }
00188 
00189         // Merge with children
00190         std::vector<Node*>::iterator child;
00191         for (child = mChildren.begin(); child != mChildren.end(); ++child)
00192         {
00193             SceneNode* sceneChild = static_cast<SceneNode*>(*child);
00194             mWorldAABB.merge(sceneChild->mWorldAABB);
00195         }
00196 
00197     }
00198     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00199     void SceneNode::_findVisibleObjects(Camera* cam, RenderQueue* queue, bool includeChildren)
00200     {
00201         // Check self visible
00202         if (!cam->isVisible(mWorldAABB))
00203             return;
00204 
00205         // Add all entities
00206         std::vector<MovableObject*>::iterator iobj;
00207         std::vector<MovableObject*>::iterator iobjend = mObjects.end();
00208         for (iobj = mObjects.begin(); iobj != iobjend; ++iobj)
00209         {
00210             (*iobj)->_updateRenderQueue(queue);
00211         }
00212 
00213         if (includeChildren)
00214         {
00215             std::vector<Node*>::iterator child, childend;
00216             childend = mChildren.end();
00217             for (child = mChildren.begin(); child != childend; ++child)
00218             {
00219                 SceneNode* sceneChild = static_cast<SceneNode*>(*child);
00220                 sceneChild->_findVisibleObjects(cam, queue, includeChildren);
00221             }
00222         }
00223 
00224     }
00225     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00226     Node* SceneNode::createChildImpl(void)
00227     {
00228         return mCreator->createSceneNode();
00229     }
00230     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00231     Node* SceneNode::createChildImpl(const String& name)
00232     {
00233         return mCreator->createSceneNode(name);
00234     }
00235     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00236     SceneNode* SceneNode::createChild(const Vector3& translate, const Quaternion& rotate)
00237     {
00238         // Provided as a passthrough to superclass just for compatibility with 
00239         // the previous version of the SceneNode interface (before I abstracted to Node)
00240         return static_cast<SceneNode*>(Node::createChild(translate, rotate));
00241     }
00242     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00243     SceneNode* SceneNode::createChild(const String& name, 
00244         const Vector3& translate,const Quaternion& rotate)
00245     {
00246         // Provided as a passthrough to superclass just for compatibility with 
00247         // the previous version of the SceneNode interface (before I abstracted to Node)
00248         return static_cast<SceneNode*>(Node::createChild(name, translate, rotate));
00249     }
00250     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00251     SceneNode* SceneNode::getChild(unsigned short index)
00252     {
00253         // Provided as a passthrough to superclass just for compatibility with 
00254         // the previous version of the SceneNode interface (before I abstracted to Node)
00255         return static_cast<SceneNode*>(Node::getChild(index));
00256     }
00257     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00258     SceneNode* SceneNode::removeChild(unsigned short index)
00259     {
00260         // Provided as a passthrough to superclass just for compatibility with 
00261         // the previous version of the SceneNode interface (before I abstracted to Node)
00262         return static_cast<SceneNode*>(Node::removeChild(index));
00263     }
00264     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00265     AxisAlignedBox SceneNode::_getWorldAABB(void) const
00266     {
00267         return mWorldAABB;
00268     }
